relationships.new_detail: Chen deciphers Lin's poker tells confirming deliberate temporal sabotage

events.details: Chen collapses with temporal feedback burns, his counting now appearing in glowing numerals on his skin
consequences: Su administers experimental temporal stabilizer from ship's original logs

events.details: While treating Chen, Su discovers the ship's original schematic showing hidden compartments matching his burn patterns
consequences: Chen recognizes one compartment as Lin's claimed 'storage room'
Duplicates schematic using laundry marking techniques

events.details: Chen serves drinks at officer's game, noticing Lin's micro-expressions change when temporal stabilizer is mentioned
consequences: Confirms Lin's knowledge of future events through betting patterns
Photographs Lin's special chips with UV-sensitive phone

events.details: Comparing burn coordinates with service maps, Chen finds hidden maintenance logs showing previous temporal loops
consequences: Discovers the ship has reappeared seven times before
Each disappearance occurred when countdown reached zero

events.details: Chen deliberately spills drink on Lin, revealing temporal energy sparks - prompting violent reaction
consequences: Su administers sedative proving effective against temporal anomalies
